user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a product selection page for a smartphone. It shows different color options (Silver, Gold, Space Gray) and configurations with or without AppleCare+. The price for the "Without AppleCare+" option is $967.50, and the "With AppleCare+" option is $1098.00. There is a message indicating that the item cannot be shipped to the selected delivery location (Netherlands). Additionally, accessory options like Microsoft 365 and Adobe Acrobat are available for purchase.
